chart 6 chart 7 chart 8 chart 9 border options you can weave all your ends in you can crochet over your ends as you go you can create a fringe border if you leave a good length at the beginning and end of every row you can create a double border to hide in all your ends for my border i slip stitched around the blanket and made a double border at this point i switched to a 4 5mm hook on the front i crocheted 1 row of single_crochet and 3 row of half_double_crochet on the back 4 row of half_double_crochet row yarn brand color row yarn brand color row yarn brand color 1 l&t impeccable heather 81
